title: Admin Login with Correct OTP
description: Verify admin logs in successfully using correct username, password, and valid OTP.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page.
Enter valid admin username and password.
Submit login credentials.
Enter the correct OTP received via authorized channel.
Submit OTP.
Confirm admin account dashboard loads successfully.

title: Admin Login Failure with Incorrect OTP
description: Verify login fails when an incorrect or expired OTP is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to admin login page.
Enter valid admin username and password.
Submit login credentials.
Enter incorrect or expired OTP.
Submit OTP.
Verify error message is displayed indicating invalid OTP and access denied.

title: Admin Dashboard Loads with Accurate Statistics
description: Verify dashboard shows real-time statistics, charts, and quick actions after successful login.

steps.description: Log in as admin using valid credentials and OTP.
Confirm dashboard page loads without errors.
Verify key statistics such as total customers, technicians, and bookings are displayed accurately.
Check interactive charts render correctly with expected data.
Verify quick action buttons are present and clickable.

title: Customer CRUD Operations
description: Verify admin can create, read, update, and delete customer profiles successfully with validation.

steps.description: Navigate to customer management page.
Create a new customer with valid details and submit.
Confirm new customer appears in the customer list.
View the newly created customer's details.
Verify all entered data is displayed correctly.
Edit the customer's information with valid changes and save.
Confirm updates are reflected in the customer profile.
Delete the customer.
Verify the customer is removed from the list.
Attempt to create customer with invalid or missing required fields.
Check appropriate validation error messages are displayed.

title: Technician Profile Management with Approval Workflow
description: Verify admin can approve or reject technician profiles including skill tracking and profile updates.

steps.description: Navigate to technician management page.
View a pending technician profile awaiting approval.
Review technician skills and profile details.
Approve the technician profile.
Confirm status changes to approved and technician is listed as active.
Edit an approved technician's skills and save changes.
Check updated skills are correctly reflected.
Reject a pending technician profile and provide reason.
Verify profile status updates to rejected and reason is stored.

title: Service and Service Category CRUD Operations
description: Verify admin can manage services and categories with correct CRUD functionality and validation.

steps.description: Navigate to service categories management.
Create a new service category with valid data.
Verify the new category is listed.
Update the service category name or description.
Confirm the updated details are saved and displayed.
Delete a service category.
Check the category is removed and no services are orphaned.
Navigate to service management page.
Create a new service including assigning it to a category.
Confirm new service appears with correct details.
Edit the service details such as price, description, and availability.
Verify changes are persisted.
Delete the service.
Confirm service is deleted and no related bookings remain orphaned.

title: Booking Management: Status Tracking and Updates
description: Verify booking lifecycle management including status changes and timeline tracking available to admin, customers, and technicians.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to booking management page.
View list of bookings with current statuses.
Change a booking status to 'In Progress' and save.
Verify status updates correctly in the system and is reflected on customer and technician portals.
Update booking details such as assigned technician or scheduled date.
Confirm updates are saved and timeline logs changes.
Set a booking status to 'Completed'.
Check final status and history reflect completion.
Attempt to update booking with invalid status transitions.
Verify system rejects invalid transitions with appropriate error messages.

title: Component Inventory Management CRUD
description: Verify management of repair components including addition, update, deletion, and inventory tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to component inventory page.
Add new component with valid name, quantity, and other required data.
Confirm component appears in inventory list.
Edit existing component information and stock quantity.
Verify changes persist and display correctly.
Delete a component.
Confirm component no longer listed and no active bookings reference it.
Attempt to create or update component with invalid or negative quantity.
Check that validation messages are shown and operation blocked.

title: Notification Delivery and Display
description: Verify users (admin, customers, technicians) receive and can view relevant notifications timely.

steps.description: Trigger notification generation (e.g., booking status update).
Verify notification appears in the relevant user's notification list.
Access notification panel as customer and technician respectively.
Confirm notifications show correct message content and timestamp.
Mark notification as read or delete it.
Verify notification status updates or item is removed accordingly.

title: Responsive UI and Dark Mode Toggle
description: Verify that UI renders correctly on various screen sizes and that dark mode toggle works and persists.

steps.description: Access any main page (e.g., dashboard) on desktop viewport.
Verify layout and elements render properly without overflow or clipping.
Resize viewport to tablet and mobile dimensions.
Validate responsive layout adapts and remains usable.
Toggle dark mode using provided UI control.
Verify color scheme changes to dark mode consistently.
Reload the page or navigate away and back.
Confirm dark mode preference is retained.

title: Accessibility Compliance Verification
description: Verify application meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards with keyboard navigation and ARIA roles.

steps.description: Navigate through key pages using keyboard (tab, shift+tab, enter).
Verify focus order is logical and visible on all interactive elements.
Ensure no keyboard trap occurs and all controls are accessible.
Use a screen reader tool to navigate pages.
Confirm ARIA roles and labels correctly describe UI components.

title: Reports and Analytics Data Visualization
description: Verify that reports generate accurate data and charts render properly with export functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to reports and analytics page as admin.
Verify charts load with correct data corresponding to database state.
Interact with charts (hover, filter, zoom if applicable).
Confirm chart interaction updates visualization accordingly.
Use export option to download report in supported formats.
Verify exported file contains correct and complete data.

title: System Settings Management and Persistence
description: Verify admin can update system configurations through settings UI and changes apply without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to system settings page.
Modify various settings fields with valid data.
Save changes.
Verify changes are saved successfully and confirmation message is shown.
Reload the settings page.
Confirm previously saved settings are retained.
Attempt to submit invalid or incomplete configurations.
Check validation errors are shown and prevent saving.

title: Customer Portal Booking Management
description: Verify customers can view available services, create bookings, view booking status, and receive notifications.

steps.description: Login as a customer.
Navigate to services catalog.
Confirm services list loads with accurate info.
Create a booking for a selected service with valid data.
Verify booking is added and visible in the customer's booking list.
View booking details and status.
Confirm booking status updates reflect in real-time.
Check notifications related to booking status.
Verify notifications are received and displayed appropriately.

title: Technician Portal Work and Booking Management
description: Verify technicians can view assigned bookings, update status, and receive related notifications.

steps.description: Login as a technician.
Access list of assigned bookings.
Verify all assigned bookings are displayed with correct details.
Update booking status (e.g., mark as in-progress or completed).
Confirm status update is saved and reflected in the data.
Review received notifications related to work assignments.
Verify notifications are timely and contain accurate information.

title: Multi-User Authentication Access Control
description: Verify separate authentication flows for admin, customers, and technicians restrict access appropriately.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard using technician credentials.
Verify access is denied with proper error or redirect.
Attempt to access customer portal using admin credentials.
Verify access is restricted or redirected.
Login as customer, navigate to technician-only pages.
Confirm access is blocked.
Login as technician and access admin-only pages.
Verify access denied.

title: Public Service Catalog Display
description: Verify public users can view service catalog and service details without authentication.

steps.description: Access the service public catalog page without login.
Confirm a list of all services and categories are displayed correctly.
Click on a service to view detailed information.
Verify service detail page loads with accurate data.

title: Error Handling for Invalid URLs and Permissions
description: Verify system handles invalid URLs gracefully and displays correct messages for unauthorized access.

steps.description: Manually enter an invalid URL within the application domain.
Verify user receives a custom 404 page or friendly not-found message.
Attempt to access restricted resource without sufficient permissions.
Confirm access denied message or redirection to login is presented.
